TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag extends System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsElement

summary.span: Represents a tag that contains [ECMAScript](https://www.ecma-international.org/publications/standards/Ecma-327.htm) that is run when the rule is matched.

span.span: Represents a tag that contains [ECMAScript](https://www.ecma-international.org/publications/standards/Ecma-327.htm) that is run when the rule is matched.

span.span: Creates an instance of the class.

summary.span: Creates an instance of the class.

span.span: Creates an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks このコンス トラクターを作成するセマンティック解釈タグを持つプロパティには、空の文字列が含まれています。This constructor creates a semantic interpretation tag whose property contains an empty string.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string script) cil managed

param.name: script
param.span: A string that contains the [ECMAScript](https://www.ecma-international.org/publications/standards/Ecma-327.htm) for the tag.

span.span: A string that contains the [ECMAScript](https://www.ecma-international.org/publications/standards/Ecma-327.htm) for the tag.

summary.span: Creates an instance of the class, specifying the script contents of the tag.

span.span: Creates an instance of the class, specifying the script contents of the tag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks このコンス トラクターを作成するセマンティック解釈タグを持つプロパティの値に`script`です。This constructor creates a semantic interpretation tag whose property is set to the value in `script`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Script { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Script : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the [ECMAScript](https://www.ecma-international.org/publications/standards/Ecma-327.htm) for the tag.

span.span: Gets or sets the [ECMAScript](https://www.ecma-international.org/publications/standards/Ecma-327.htm) for the tag.

value.span: タグのセマンティクス解釈スクリプトを含む文字列です。

span.span: A string that contains the semantic interpretation script for the tag.
